summary: We testified on the Tribal Energy Financing Program before the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs. It is based primarily on the following report: Tribal Energy Finance: Changes to DOE Loan Program Would Reduce Barriers for Tribes. We made 5 recommendations to the Department of Energy in that report, including that it revise its review process to reduce fees. DOE is working to address those recommendations...
title: Tribal Energy Finance: DOE Actions Needed to Reduce Barriers for Tribes
